last_episode_to_air.name: Kill or Be Killed
last_episode_to_air.overview: Trujillo’s 30-year reign of terror comes to an end; in 1999, Arantxa meets Minerva’s daughter.

name: The Cry of the Butterflies
overview: This series examines the events leading up the brutal murder of Dominican activist Minerva Mirabal and her two activist sisters, on the orders of dictator Rafael Leónidas Trujillo. The heinous crime would set in motion not only the end of a vicious regime, but also come to mark the global fight against gender-based violence.

episodes.name: Dancing with the Devil
episodes.overview: Minerva Mirabal and her family face retaliation after she refuses the President's advances.

episodes.name: Two Roads
episodes.overview: Don Enrique is freed; a boyfriend from Minerva’s past reappears; Arantxa dodges questions in 1999.

episodes.name: The Test
episodes.overview: Arantxa's new line of work brings her closer to the regime; 1999, Pilar looks to the past for clues.

episodes.name: Peaks and Valleys
episodes.overview: Don Enrique encourages Minerva to pursue her dreams; 1999, Arantxa calls off the interview.

episodes.name: The Price of Dreams
episodes.overview: Trujillo reveals something about Minerva’s law exam; 1999, Pilar pushes to continue the interview.

episodes.name: The Hunted
episodes.overview: The regime targets the Mirabals once again; Pilar convinces Arantxa to tell her story in 1999.

episodes.name: You'll Be Gipsy
episodes.overview: Arantxa finds herself in a leading role on the regime’s new channel; 1999, Arantxa’s health falters.

episodes.name: The Moment of Truth
episodes.overview: Arantxa tries to hide a secret romance. 1999: Pilar’s efforts begin to pay off.

episodes.name: Bring Jimmy Alves
episodes.overview: Minerva parts ways with Pierre; Arantxa realizes she is living in a gilded cage.

episodes.name: Let Us Die with Our Boots On
episodes.overview: Minerva and Manolo learn of a plot to oust Trujillo; 1999, Pilar invites Arantxa to New York.

episodes.name: June 14
episodes.overview: Minerva’s circle is targeted in the regime’s crackdown; Arantxa reunites with an old friend in 1999.

episodes.name: Make It Look Like an Accident
episodes.overview: Events take a dark turn for Minerva and sisters Patria and María Teresa; Dedé meets Arantxa in 1999.

episodes.name: Kill or Be Killed
episodes.overview: Trujillo’s 30-year reign of terror comes to an end; in 1999, Arantxa meets Minerva’s daughter.
